name: FightWynnflaedOsgar
condition: (unit.nid == "Davenport" and unit2.nid == "Brassfield" and not has_skill(unit, 'Thrall') and not has_skill(unit2, 'Thrall')) or (unit.nid == "Brassfield" and unit2.nid == "Davenport" and not has_skill(unit, 'Thrall') and not has_skill(unit2, 'Thrall'))
_source: speak;Brassfield;Is that you, Osgar?{w} What happened{br}to you?{w} Those wounds of yours...;center;;boss_convo_left

speak;Osgar;Lethal, once.{w} But no longer.{w} These{br}people helped me overcome death.{w}{clear}These people...{w} MY people...{w} both{br}long ago, and now once again.{w}{clear}I'm back where I belong.;center;;boss_convo_right
s;Brassfield;...{w} I don't want to fight you.|You're a good man.{w} Don't-;center;;boss_convo_left
s;Osgar;It's too late for that, Wynn.|The fighting's already started.{w}{clear}Time to see it through, aye?;center;;boss_convo_right
s;Brassfield;...{w} Aye.{w} Suppose you're right.|I won't go easy if you won't.;center;;boss_convo_left
s;Brassfield;Osgar.{w} Never expected it would{br}come to something like this, eh?;center;;boss_convo_right
s;Davenport;There's still time.{w} Put your{br}weapon down, and we can still-;center;;boss_convo_left
s;Brassfield;No.{w} I-I mean...{w} I want to.{w} I do.|But I won't.{w} You understand.;center;;boss_convo_right
s;Davenport;...{w} Aye.{w} I may not agree, but...|understanding's another thing.|No hard feelings if I kill you?;center;;boss_convo_left
s;Brassfield;I'll kick your ass in the next{br}life if you do.{w} Sound fair?;center;;boss_convo_right
